org.educraft.entity

Class NumberZombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.entity.Entity
      • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase
        • net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.entity.monster.IMob, net.minecraft.entity.passive.IAnimals, INumberMob

    public class NumberZombie
extends net.minecraft.entity.monster.EntityZombie
implements INumberMob
    Customised zombie that drops a number between 1 and 10 upon death, in place of its normal drops.
